timeline.message: Generate reference tests to ensure we run them all.
Don't compile the reference tests until we've downloaded them.
Capture test reports as an artifact.
Merge branch 'fix-ref-tests' of github.com:ajsutton/teku into fix-ref-tests
Capture test results xml files as a tarball.
Load ssz roots the modern way.

timeline.bodyText: Why are we ignoring these tests?
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: We've never run the ssz_generic tests previously.  Would be good to enable at least some of them like bitvector and bitlist which should be a lot simpler now.
replies.author: ajsutton

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense for these TestFinder classes to throw if they don't find any tests? Since that is unexpected.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: It's expected that they won't find tests in some cases - for example there are no shuffling tests under general and no genesis tests under mainnet.
replies.author: ajsutton
